entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then periods of snow. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending before morning then mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
